mdRecord.dcterms:title: To the Electors of the State of New-York: Fellow Citizens! The glorious triumph of federalism is at hand. : Our administration appalled by the manly opposition made by the patriotic minority in Congress, and by the majority of the people in the Northern and Eastern States against the ruinous Embargo and Non-Intercourse system, have at length concluded to yield to the terms offered by Great Britain more than eighteen months since / Harmanus P. Schuyler, Chairman of the Albany Corresponding Committee. John Lovett, Sec'ry.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Federal Party (N.Y.)
Schuyler, Harmanus P.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: An "Extract of a letter from the Federal General Committee, dated New-York, Saturday 22nd April, 6 o'clock afternoon" is printed at the bottom of the sheet.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Tracy W. McGregor Library.
